channel.title: CVE Feed for Helmholz -- myREX24
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Helmholz -- myREX24

item.title: CVE-2021-34574|2024-08-04T00:19:46.604Z -- helmholz -- myrex24
item.description: In MB connect line mymbCONNECT24, mbCONNECT24 and Helmholz myREX24 and myREX24.virtual in all versions through v2.11.2 an authenticated attacker can change the password of his account into a new password that violates the password policy by intercepting and modifying the request that is send to the server.
